Welcome to Sunrise Bakery

Freshly baked goods every morning with a cup of warm coffee! Come visit us or get your favourite treats delivered right to your door.


At Sunrise Bakery, we pride ourselves on using the finest ingredients to create delicious pastries, breads, and cakes that will brighten your day. Whether you're stopping by for a quick breakfast or picking up treats for a special occasion, we've got something for everyone!

Order Now!

Our Products

Discover our delicious range of baked goods!

Fresh Pastries

Crispy croissants, flaky danishes, and more, baked fresh daily to satisfy your sweet tooth.

Artisan Breads

Handcrafted breads with a perfect crust and soft interior, made using traditional methods.

Delicious Cakes

From classic chocolate to fruity delights, our cakes are perfect for any celebration.
